txt.en: 'Ah, very good. These will do nicely, [placeholder].\n\n'You see, the size of my house matters little to me—it is that I can call it my own!'
Deliver the thick branches to Dúghild
Dúghild can be found at Khadâsh-gâra in Elderslade.\n\nYou have collected a number of thick branches in Elderslade and should now deliver them to Dúghild at Khadâsh-gâra.
One of the Want-kin, Dúghild, toils to gather wood from Elderslade in an effort to build a new home.
Thick branches can be found fallen from the trees in Elderslade.\n\nDúghild has asked you to collect thick branches in Elderslade.

'It is a proud tradition among dwarves to craft great works.

'Indeed, I have cut and set the most beautiful gem-stones you can imagine, but never have I built a home I could call my own. That is what I wish to do here, [placeholder].

'My first essay into this new craft-skill will be building a home of wood. I have seen countless branches lying about in the Slade, and if I cannot make something from them... well, I wouldn't be much of a dwarf, now would I?

'Find some thick branches for me, and I will do the rest.'
